item.description:
The Sun is Shining, The Trees are Greener,
The Weather is Warmer, and the Socials are HOTTER!

Heat up the dance floor with us at our May Masacote Salsa Bash!

Come dance with us every
2nd Saturday of the month!

FREE SALSA LESSON @ 8! So bring all your friends with 2 left feet! We'll get them dancing in No Time!

SPECIAL SNEAK PREVIEW PERFORMANCE!

Masacote Dance Co. will be debuting it's newest choroegraphy, Melancholy, at this month's social! Get a sneak preview before the Fantagious CD Release!


Find out what has made Boston so special in the Salsa Community worldwide! Join us every month for a night of Salsa dancing with 200+ friendly & lively salsa dancers!


Beginner Friendly!
No partner necessary!
Grrrrreat way to meet new people!


Salsa Fundamentals for Beginners Lesson 8-9pm for only $2! Learn the Basics & Practice with Friends from the class after!

3 hours of DANCING starting at 9pm!

Party for ONLY $8! Student Discount: $5!
FREE Lesson!


Cash Bar...Plenty of FREE Parking...Warm, Family Vibe!
All Ages Welcome!


THIS NIGHT IS CREATED BY DANCERS, FOR DANCERS!
OUR LOVE OF SALSA IS THE SHEER MOTIVATION FOR THIS NIGHT.
IT IS THE PERFECT PLACE FOR THAT SALSA FIX!


This night is for YOU!
From the venue, to the atmosphere, to the music, we are paying careful attention to the details. If there is anything that you are looking for, please let us know!

Location:
Knights of Columbus
75 West School St.
Charlestown, MA 02129

For More Info:
http://www.masacoteen...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be performing with the group!
item.why: You'll get to see a special SNEAK PEAK of Melancholy, Masacote Dance Co's newest choreography!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Masacote Salsa Bash! Performance by Masacote Dance Co. THIS MONTH!
